definition: to weave/to plait/to organize/to group/to arrange/to edit/to compile/to write/to compose/to fabricate
weight/number/code/to pile/to stack/classifier for length or distance (yard), happenings etc

sentences.english: NorthStar, the first name in heavy-duty encoders, has the solution.
sentences.chinese: 北極星，在重型編碼器的名字，有解決方案。

sentences.english: Incremental encoders without bearings for drives with large axial play or high speeds.
sentences.chinese: 無軸承的驅動器增量式編碼器與大型軸向或高速行駛。

sentences.english: Some drives have pass-through signaling on encoders and limits.
sentences.chinese: 一些設備發送信號採用編碼器傳輸和限定。

sentences.english: You may do some cropping of the Encoder if required.
sentences.chinese: 你可以做一些種植的編碼器，如果需要的。

sentences.english: The half-closed-loop takes two common rotary encoders.
sentences.chinese: 半閉環採取傳統的兩個旋轉編碼器控制方式。

sentences.english: However, the complexity of AAC encoder is also very high.
sentences.chinese: 然而AAC編碼器的複雜度也很高。

sentences.english: The M100 can test all popular incremental encoder configurations.
sentences.chinese: 在M100可以測試所有流行的增量編碼器配置。

sentences.english: The standard encoder resolution is 2048 lines per rev.
sentences.chinese: 標準編碼器分辨率爲2048轉速每行。

sentences.english: The paper introduces the design and adjustment of resolver and synchronizer axial angle encoder.
sentences.chinese: 介紹旋變及同步機軸角編碼器的典型電路設計與調試。

sentences.english: Locate industry-specific encoder case studies and primers quickly and easily.
sentences.chinese: 找到特定行業的編碼器的個案研究和底漆快捷方便。

sentences.english: Rotary encoder, roller parts, belt conveyance apparatus, and image forming apparatus.
sentences.chinese: 迴轉式編碼器，輥部件，帶運送裝置及圖像形成裝置。

sentences.english: The optical electric axial angle encoder is a kind of widely used optical electric sensor for angle detecting.
sentences.chinese: 光電軸角編碼器是一種應用廣泛的光電角位置傳感器。

sentences.english: Auto-Tune support for any servo motor with encoder feedback.
sentences.chinese: 自動調爲任何編碼器反饋伺服電機的支持。

sentences.english: For QuickTime, codec code cases are mixed.
When overridden in a derived class, sets the encoder back to its initial state.
sentences.chinese: 在派生類中重寫時，將編碼器設置回它的初始狀態。

sentences.english: Photoelectric detector and photoelectric encoder carry on the deviation to measure.
sentences.chinese: 光電眼和光電編碼器進行偏差檢測。

definition: to verify accounting records/also written 對帳|对帐[dui4 zhang4]
